name: Puzzl3
description:
A very basic puzzle game for Slow Summer Jams July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games. In Puzzl3, you can move left, right and forwards, but not backwards.  Clones of the player's previous actions can be created by pressing the left and right arrows at the same time, which helps solve puzzles around pressing buttons and opening and closing gates. Currently there are only a few levels, but in the future more may be added.

Credits:

The tile-set is a modified version of Pixel_Poem's 2D Pixel Dungeon Asset Pack.
